resources.string: Unable to fetch booklet. Check your internet connection and retry.

Created on October 14, 2003, Engineers Without Borders Cameroon is a development driven association. EWB Cameroon promotes human development through access to scientific and technological knowledge. Its activities are organized around four (4) structuring programs: local development, natural resources management, information and communication for development and knowledge management for development. For more information, visit: www.isf-cameroun.org
